actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Eastern District of California shall be held at the Modesto-Ceres metropolitan area, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of California shall be held at the Modesto-Ceres metropolitan area, in addition to those places currently authorized.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Eastern District of California shall be held at the Modesto-Ceres metropolitan area, in addition to those places currently provided by law.
